location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Charge d'affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is asking the Resident to pay a bonus to the Cossid conveying a dispatch (not present) for India, which accompanies this letter, if he reaches Bushire by a certain date. It further requests that he provides a subsistence allowance to the Cossid for each day he has to remain at Bushire.
